en-GB.summary: Show the succulent of the day from the British Cactus and Succulent Society
examplePhrases: Alexa open the succulent of the day
Alexa tell succulent of the day to show me a succulent
Alexa ask succulent of the day for a plant
en-GB.name: succulent-of-the-day
en-GB.description: Gives you the latest information about succulents from the British Cactus and Succulent Society.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Ask Alexa to show you the succulent of the day. Should speak some information and show a picture of a succulent on a screen-enabled device.
